name: Super Stickman - smashy stickman endless tap run and jumping adventure
name_original: Super Stickman - smashy stickman endless tap run and jumping adventure
description:
Every hero needs to make a good getaway…
Unleash your inner hero as you avoid the obstacles to score as many points as possible!!!

Help the Super Hero to jump from building to building...

[ How to play ]
- tap screen to jump
- tap again to double jump
- avoid colored buildings...

Download it now…
And Enjoy the game!!!
